The Recruitment Crisis

Healthcare facilities face unprecedented staffing shortages, with traditional recruitment taking months to fill critical positions while patient care suffers.

The manual processes for credentialing, verification, and candidate matching are slow, expensive, and often result in poor fits that lead to turnover.

Locum tenens agencies rely on outdated methods, creating inefficiencies that cost healthcare systems up to $100k per failed hire.

Our AI Solution

CureHire's proprietary AI analyzes deep clinical data to match candidates with positions in under 28 hours, ensuring optimal fit for both skillset and culture.

Automated credentialing, scheduling, and logistics management reduce administrative burden while maintaining the highest quality standards through AI-powered risk assessments.

Our platform combines cutting-edge technology with personalized human touch, delivering presentation times that are 3x faster than traditional agencies.

AI-Powered Features

Revolutionizing healthcare recruitment with intelligent automation

AI-driven talent identification and matching

Streamlined credentialing and verification process

Real-time candidate tracking and analytics

Automated scheduling and logistics coordination

Quality assurance through medical reviews

HIPAA-compliant platform and processes

Comprehensive travel and lodging management

24/7 support for providers and facilities
